channel.title: LLVM on THALIUM
channel.description: Recent content in LLVM on THALIUM

item.title: LLVM-powered deobfuscation of virtualized binaries
item.description: Virtualization is a powerful technique for code obfuscation, and reversing it can be challenging. In this post, we cover the work done during an internship on developing an automated devirtualization tool. We explore a simplified taint-based approach and discuss its limitations. For a more in-depth analysis, the full report is also made available.
